title: #113: Sidestepping Big Tech Censorship | Grimerica
description:
Darren & Graham from the wildly popular Grimerica show stop by to explain what they have been building to remove themselves from the crosshairs of Big Tech, and why it might be helpful for everyone to start looking for alternatives.

Also, itâ€™s been a bit of a mixed bag when it comes to the COVID authoritarian push in Canada, so the guys fill in the details on what they have been experiencing with the nonstop propaganda on the virus, the masks, and of course, the frantic vaccine push.
